page.title: 11OUTLANE DRUM MAJORETTES
page.content: Caroline Newsome is a member of{ {Outlane Drum Majorettes.}They used to practise their displays at Outlane Youth Centre. They had been practising there since 1982 but were recentley told to move out because of the building's bad condition. With nowhere else to go they had only one week to move their instruments from the building. They therefore decided to publicise their predicament. They tried the television programme{"That's {Life"}and Esther Ranzen was more than happy to help. They appeared on the programme and a pop group called{"The {Strand"}who saw the majorettes perform asked them to do a display for their video for the single{"Drum {Majorettes."} The Council could not, however, change their decision.
